topic.title: Known Problems and Limitations
topic.shortdesc: You may encounter some known limitations when working in the KVM region of this release.

section.title: Cinder Block Storage snapshot feature not working
section.p: For HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade cloud using 3PAR iSCSI configured as the Cinder block storage service. The Cinder volume snapshot feature might not function properly if following entries are enabled in the /etc/cinder/cinder.conf file.
To correct this issue, edit the /etc/cinder/cinder.conf file to disable these entries, as follows:
The hp3par_snapshot_retention entry is the time in hours to retain a snapshot.
The hp3par_snapshot_expiration entry is the time in hours when a snapshot expires and is deleted.

section.title: LDAP conflict causing error with templates
section.p: When deploying templates, such as VMAutoScaling.yaml you might receive a n error similar to the following: Error: Canâ€™t find role heat_stack_user.
The problem is due to an inconsistency in the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade LDAP implementation. To fix this problem, you should disable LDAP in Keystone.

ol.li: Before deploying HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade, edit the definition.json as the following flag is set to 0. "ldap_enabled": 1,

After deploying HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade, on each controller, modify the /etc/keystone/keystone.conf to comment-out the LDAP entry and uncomment SQL driver, as shown: [identity] driver = keystone.identity.backends.sql.Identity #driver = keystone.identity.backends.ldap.Identity

li.p: SR-IOV is supported only for Intel 82599.
The maximum number of VFs per NIC is 32.
SR-IOV and PCI passthrough cannot both be used on the same provider network.
VLAN over bonded interface without an assigned network type is not supported.
Addition of an infrastructure interface after installation is not functional.
Consolidation of the infrastructure network over the OAM network is not supported.

Stacked VLANs are not supported. On a consolidated management or infrastructure interface, a VLAN provider network can be associated directly with the untagged interface; however, flat or VXLAN provider networks must be associated with a consolidated VLAN data interface.
Interface profiles cannot be created for VLAN interface types.
The system host-if-modify-ports command is deprecated.

For a Mellanox CX3, all ports must be used ether for data interfaces, or for non-data interfaces. It is not possible to use some ports for data interfaces and others for non-data interfaces on the same Mellanox CX3 NIC.
Jumbo frames are not supported on Mellanox NICs.

section.title: Installation does not fully utilize disks greater than two terabytes
section.p: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade in the KVM region can be installed on disks greater than 2 TB, but only 2 TB of the disk is useable.

section.title: Cannot create Cinder LVM volumes using disks greater than two terabytes
section.p: Using a disk greater than 2 TB for Cinder LVM results in a config_controller failure.

section.title: Guest heartbeat and notification features are not fully validated.
section.p: Heartbeat and notification services for VMs are not fully validated.

section.title: Cinder API version generates a log warning
section.p: The V1 API for Cinder in use by this version of HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade is deprecated, resulting in log warnings.
